subject: SMILES
description:
Returns a given Property Type for: 
  -<cmd>molecular_weight</cmd>: Calculate molecular weight of a molecule.
  -<cmd>number_of_aromatic_rings</cmd>: Calculate number of aromatic rings of a molecule.
  -<cmd>number_of_h_acceptors</cmd>: Calculate number of H acceptors of a molecule.
  -<cmd>number_of_h_donors</cmd>: Calculate number of H donors of a molecule.
  -<cmd>number_of_atoms</cmd>: Calculate number of atoms of a molecule.
  -<cmd>number_of_rings</cmd>: Calculate number of rings of a molecule.
  -<cmd>number_of_rotatable_bonds</cmd>: Calculate number of rotatable bonds of a molecule.
  -<cmd>number_of_large_rings</cmd>: Calculate the amount of large rings (> 6 atoms) of a molecule.
  -<cmd>number_of_heterocycles</cmd>: The amount of heterocycles of a molecule.
  -<cmd>number_of_stereocenters</cmd>: The amount of stereo centers of a molecule.
  -<cmd>is_scaffold</cmd>: Whether a molecule is identical to its Murcko Scaffold.
  -<cmd>bertz</cmd>: Calculate Bertz index of a molecule.
  -<cmd>tpsa</cmd>: Calculate the total polar surface area of a molecule.
  -<cmd>logp</cmd>: Calculates the partition coefficient of a molecule.
  -<cmd>qed</cmd>: Calculate the quantitative estimate of drug-likeness (QED) of a molecule.
  -<cmd>plogp</cmd>: Calculate the penalized logP of a molecule. This is the logP minus the number of
    rings with > 6 atoms minus the SAS.
    
  -<cmd>penalized_logp</cmd>: Calculate the penalized logP of a molecule. This is the logP minus the number of
    rings with > 6 atoms minus the SAS.
    
  -<cmd>lipinski</cmd>: Calculate whether a molecule adheres to the Lipinski-rule-of-5.
    A crude approximation of druglikeness.
    
  -<cmd>sas</cmd>: Calculate the synthetic accessibility score (SAS) for a molecule.
  -<cmd>esol</cmd>: Estimate the water solubility of a molecule.
